TextBlock.Text: OENO: This research station has been established to study the spacial distortions located within <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color>.
CYCAD: Our clan has spent far too long ignoring this place as a result of the tragedy that occurred here.

OENO: I am pleased to report that our research is progressing rapidly! We have determined that the space within <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color> is distorted to an impossible degree. This space cannot possibly exist within a single location.

CYCAD: Hypothesis: when an object, or entity, enters <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color>, the interior manifests elsewhere within a pocket of space linked to this one. This manifestation would exert a repelling force on objects in its surroundings even when unoccupied.

OENO: By studying the sky after an object has entered <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color>, we believe we have located the space the interior occupies. Coleus informs us that the phenomenon is most unsettling to observe.
CYCAD: This phenomenon may prove to have untapped comical potential. I am eager to observe the reactions of Lami, Laevi, and Taget (the children) upon first sighting of the eclipse.

CYCAD: The <Color=lightblue>comet</Color> Spire detected is entering the system! Oeno and I will be rejoining the rest of our clan to await news from the expedition team. Further exploration of this phenomenon must wait for a subsequent time.
